sense.gloss: to be related, to be connected, to be joined together
to result in, to lead to, to bring about

sdata.j: ↑他人↑↓たにん↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑押↑↓お↓さえつけることはできても、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑発言↑↓はつげん↓がどんな↑結果↑↓けっか↓に↑結↑↓|むす↓びつく|かを↑想像↑↓そうぞう↓できていない。
sdata.e: Even if the opinions of others can be suppressed, I cannot imagine to what results my speech may lead.
